column2: India revokes patents on Allergan eye drugs Ganfort and Combigan MUMBAI
column3: Aug 8 India revoked patents on two of Allergan Inc's eye drugs on Thursday
column4: the latest in a series of intellectual property setbacks suffered by Western drugmakers.

column4: Imperial Aug 8 ConocoPhillips is selling its stake in a Canadian oil sands project to Exxon Mobil Corp  and Imperial Oil Ltd for about $720 million as it focuses on its U.S. shale oil and natural gas operations.  UPDATE 2-Conoco in $720 mln oil sands deal with Exxon

column2: UPDATE 2-Conoco in $720 mln oil sands deal with Exxon
column3: Imperial Aug 8 ConocoPhillips is selling its stake in a Canadian oil sands project to Exxon Mobil Corp  and Imperial Oil Ltd for about $720 million as it focuses on its U.S. shale oil and natural gas operations.
